ygData.subject: Re: high level bard suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I recently had the opposite experience.  Playing a non-bard character I ended up grouped with a bard who was helpful but far from skillful.  I ended up
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:27 PM 6/24/99 -0500, G2 Dan wrote:
>
> I continually find parties with great people but I still find the occasional
> moron inside yelling "heal bard" "level 4 song" "do this bard" etc etc..


I recently had the opposite experience. Playing a non-bard character I ended
up grouped with a bard who was helpful but far from skillful. I ended up
making a lot of suggestions, telling him they were based on observations of
other bards at work. I didn't tell him one of the other bards was me.

I also didn't tell him the person behind the cute little female he was flirting
with was a 51 year old grandfather.

He did say that he was 16. That explained a lot.

Bob
